title: infocausality | Information-Theoretic Measure of Causality
text: Information-Theoretic Measure Causality infocausality R package information-theoretic causal analysis. quantifies temporal spatial causality information flow, decomposes unique, redundant, synergistic components. package provides native support data.frame, sf, SpatRaster objects, offering unified interface time-series spatial cross-sectional causal analysis. Refer package documentation https://stscl.github.io/infocausality/ detailed information.
